00026 namespace VTD
00027 {
00031 struct Protocols
00032 {
00033     enum Enum
00034     {
00035           SCP = 0               // SCP TCP
00036         , RDB_TCP               // RDB TCP
00037         , RDB_UDP               // RDB UDP
00038         , RDB_UDP_SEND_ONLY     // RDB UDP block sending
00039         , RDB_UDP_RECEIVE_ONLY  // RDB UDP block receiving
00040     };
00041 };
00045 static const unsigned short sMagicNoSCP = 40108;  // simulation control protocol
00046 static const unsigned short sMagicNoRDB = 35712;  // run-time data bus
00047 
00048 // Callback function
00049 typedef boost::function<void(const boost::system::error_code&, const ConnectionHandle&)> Callback;
00050 
00054 class ServicePort : public MessageCallback
00055 {
00056     public:
00060         ServicePort();
00061 
00065         virtual ~ServicePort();
00066 
00073         ConnectionHandle connectSCP(const std::string& hostname, unsigned int portNumber);
00074 
00084         ConnectionHandle connectRDB(const std::string& hostname, unsigned int portNumber, Protocols::Enum typeOfConnection, bool sendBlock = false, bool receiveBlock = false);
00085 
00095         virtual void connectToPort(const std::string& hostname
00096                                         , unsigned int portNumber
00097                                         , Protocols::Enum typeOfConnection
00098                                         , ConnectionHandle& handle
00099                                         , bool sendBlock = false
00100                                         , bool receiveBlock = false) = 0;
00101 
00107         virtual bool isConnected(const ConnectionHandle& handle) = 0;
00108 
00113         virtual void disconnect(ConnectionHandle& handle) = 0;
00114 
00122         virtual ConnectionHandle generateHandle(const std::string& hostname, unsigned int port, Protocols::Enum protocol);
00123 
00127         virtual void startReading() = 0;
00128 
00132         virtual void stopReading() = 0;
00133 
00141         virtual void writeScpData(const std::string& buffer
00142                                     , const ConnectionHandle& handle
00143                                     , const char* senderName = "VtdApi"
00144                                     , const char* receiverName = "TaskControl") = 0;
00145 
00151         virtual void writeRDBData(const std::vector<char>& bufferRDB, const ConnectionHandle& handle) = 0;
00152 
00153  protected:
00154         // buffer for scp and rdb data
00155         boost::array<char, SCP_HEADER_SIZE> bufferScpHdr_;
00156         std::vector<char> bufferScpData_;
00157         boost::array<char, RDB_HEADER_SIZE> bufferRDBHdr_;
00158         std::vector<char> bufferRDBData_;
00159         // necessery for windows
00160         std::vector<char> sendBuffer_;
00161         std::vector<char> bufferScpHdrSend_;
00162         // boost asio io services
